name: Samantha
initialDescription:
It's laundry day... you hate, laundry day. You spend all day working, and then... more work! At 10pm you decide to finally bite the bullet and walk to the laundrette.
As you walk in few people are there, just you and a girl, who you presume to be roughly the same age as you.
You're single, very, very, very single, so you attempt to talk to her, and with your stunning looks and signature charm what could go wrong!
endDescriptionBad: Sam seems uninterested in you, she hastily picks up here laundry and leaves
endDescriptionGood: Sam seems really interested in you, she asks to meet again, tomorrow!

dialogue.whatHappensText: Goo.. good thanks.. (Samantha's nervousness fades slightly)

dialogue.promptText: Hey... (You're just as nervous as her)

dialogue.whatHappensText: Err... you know... just reading... I don't get up to much ;-;
dialogue.promptText: What did you get up to this weekened?

dialogue.whatHappensText: I'm a student... I want to become and writer one day!
dialogue.promptText: What do you do for a living

dialogue.whatHappensText: I don't really want to talk about that right now...'
dialogue.promptText: Are you close with your family?
You're pretty..., you say as you slur your words
There's a festival going on right now, maybe we could go together?
